entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning in the afternoon. Amount 2 cm except 5 cm over northern sections. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h near noon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Temperature steady near plus 1.
